title: Cheating Boyfriend!
itunes:title: Cheating Boyfriend!
description:
I want your advice my boyfriend and I have a relationship for six years. He started cheating on me three years ago. He had a child with that girl and now he's cheating again. His mother has stopped talking to me because she thought I was trying to take her son from her.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
